title: Pines Square Dental Clinic
address: Ground Floor, Lot 6891, Block 225, Kuching North Land District at Lrg Pines Square, 2A4, Jalan Batu Kawa, New Township, 93250 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia
street: Ground Floor, Lot 6891, Block 225, Kuching North Land District at Lrg Pines Square, 2A4, Jalan Batu Kawa

reviews.name: Amy Lau (Peachy_amy)
reviews.text:
Brought my 2 year old here for a consultation because of toothache that turned out to be his teeth erupting. Dr. Tay is so so patient with my boy and waited for him to relax before checking his teeth. Bribery was involved, but I'm a fan of whatever works! My toddler has a fear of dentists and isn't easy to work with but Dr. Tay was incredibly compassionate dealing with the tantrums and managed to take a good look at his teeth. He's so good with kids. I'm so grateful for his patience.

Facility is very new and clean and everyone was super friendly. Parking was super easy too! Great experience overall!

reviews.name: Laura Cotter
reviews.text: Super satisfied with their service and treatment! Dr Tay Jr (I think) was super profesh and friendly. He made me feel comfortable the moment I entered the room. He was gentle with my teeth and made sure I was okay. It was my first time whitening my teeth, and I couldn‚Äôt be more happy! I‚Äôm definitely coming back as a regular patient! üôåüèº

reviews.name: Mei Queen Woo
reviews.text: I highly recommend this Pine Square Dental Clinic for those of you who are looking for a dedicated and highly experienced dentist who can immediately diagnose, solve your dental problems and makes sure it's done well. Highest quality of service indeed. Thank you very much for solving my serious dental problem. Appreciate it very much.

description:
At the heart of Sarawak's vibrant healthcare tapestry, Pines Square Dental Clinic emerges as a bastion of dental well-being, situated conveniently in the bustling Kuching North Land District. This dental haven stands out with its commitment to delivering professional and compassionate oral health care, wrapped in an atmosphere that is as welcoming as it is state-of-the-art. With a focus on patient-centric services, the clinic has swiftly become a favored choice for families and individuals seeking top-tier dental solutions in the region.

The patient experience at Pines Square Dental Clinic is nothing short of exceptional, with testimonials lauding not just the professional acumen but also the friendly demeanor of practitioners like Dr. Tay Jr., whose expertise and approachability have garnered high praise. Whether it's a toddler's first consultation or complex dental procedures for adults, the clinic navigates the spectrum of oral health with finesse and empathy. Exemplifying this is their adept handling of pediatric cases, where young patients leave with brighter smiles and diminished fears, a testament to the clinic's nurturing environment.

Convenience for patients is paramount, with operating hours that cater to busy lifestyles and special appointments available throughout the week. The clinic's deep-rooted connection with the local community is evident in its fair pricing structure, ensuring that quality dental care remains accessible to all. As Pines Square Dental Clinic continues to serve the heart of Jalan Batu Kawa with unparalleled dedication, it stands as a beacon for those in search of dental excellence infused with a touch of genuine Sarawakian warmth.

title: OneCare Clinic Bukit Panjang

reviews.name: Anonymous
reviews.text: Dr Kasun is my best doctor now after Dr Ivan Choo. Very caring and polite doctors.

reviews.name: francis arnold
reviews.text: I am unwell, but I still want to leave a positive review for Dr. Kasun Perera. He has excellent patient care skills and examined me thoroughly and systematically. I felt very comforted during the consultation. He took the time to clearly explain the medications he was prescribing and the reasons behind them. Thank you, Dr. Kasun Perera, for your care and professionalism.

reviews.name: Christine Hwang
reviews.text: Attentive and professional

reviews.name: Li Yin Tan
reviews.text:
Update in 2024: this clinic has improved a lot from previously as the Call system has improved a lot. Waiting time is fast and the service is efficient and fast. Marked down star due to the incomplete information during dispensing of antibiotic need to add water and after mixing keep in fridge, also number of days to take was not advised.

Recent visit improved on storage in fridge on the label instructions.

reviews.name: Jia Ling Lee
reviews.text: The clinic assistants are vibrant and friendly. The doctor is quick to administer assistance is assuring. Pleasant  experience.

reviews.name: Nancy Mak
reviews.text: Dr Jeremy  Chin from the segar clinic gives the assurance of my  condition. Although he is young, his explanation and patience are being appreciated  by us. He is a compassionate  doctor unlike some in the sector. Thumbs up  for him!

reviews.name: Tracy Lee
reviews.text: Doctor Kasim Perera is patient, kind and caring. He listens patiently to my mum‚Äôs description of her situation and discomfort before explaining the medication and things to look out for. The nurses were caring, polite and attentive too. Glad to have them around.

description:
Amidst the dynamic healthcare tapestry of Malaysia, OneCare Clinic Bukit Panjang emerges as a pivotal medical haven, revered for its exceptional patient care and professional excellence. Situated in the heart of Segar Vale, this clinic serves as a cornerstone of wellness for the local community, offering a blend of warmth and expertise that resonates with each patient who walks through its doors. With a dedicated team led by the commendable Dr. Kasun Perera, the clinic stands out for its personalized approach to healthcare, consistently receiving accolades for its attentive and caring practice.

The patient experience at OneCare Clinic Bukit Panjang is central to its ethos. Testimonials frequently applaud the staff's professionalism and kindness, painting a picture of a facility where health concerns are met with meticulous attention and genuine compassion. "Dr. Kasun is my best doctor now," shares one patient, reflecting on the clinic's ability to forge strong bonds with those in their care. The facility prides itself on this level of patient-doctor rapport, ensuring that each visit is not just about medical treatment but also about nurturing trust and understanding within the Bukit Panjang community.

Operating hours are tailored to accommodate busy schedules, offering both morning and evening consultations throughout the week. The clinic's accessibility is further enhanced by its location within Segar Vale, where it has become a trusted beacon for quality medical advice and treatment. In weaving professional care with community engagement, OneCare Clinic Bukit Panjang doesn't just serve its neighborhood; it enriches it. This commitment to health extends beyond mere services‚Äîit's an enduring pledge to safeguard the wellbeing of every individual who seeks their expertise.

title: Dental Clinic Dr. Rohani Hj. Sher Jung
address: No. 2516-A1, Flat Koperasi Sungai Gelugor, Kampung Gelugor, 11700 Gelugor, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia

reviews.name: Muhammad Zharfan
reviews.text: The service is very bad. The doctor is not friendly at all. She was so rough and not gentle at all. This will be my first and last visit to the clinic. I didnt read other reviews before i went. Really dissapointed. But the staff was really good  n friendly.

reviews.name: Top 10 Malaysia
reviews.text: The worst clinic I ever go. Habis gusi bengkak dan berdarah dia buat.DR rohaini tu Kasar sangat

reviews.text: recommended clinic because I've been going here for scaling, tooth extraction, crown and a lot more for multiple times even if I am a heart failure patients I did tooth extraction for 3 times from this clinic and there have been no problem at all, I also bring my children to this clinic because the doctor is very friendly

description:
In the bustling heart of Sungai Gelugor, Dental Clinic Dr. Rohani Hj. Sher Jung stands as a pillar of dental health, providing residents with specialized oral care that's both comprehensive and compassionate. With a commitment to personalized treatment, the clinic ensures that each patient's experience is tailored to their unique needs. Patients trust the clinic for its expertise in various dental procedures, from routine check-ups to advanced restorative work, all delivered with precision and a gentle touch.

The journey to a healthier smile at this facility is supported by state-of-the-art dental technology and a serene environment designed to alleviate any anxieties associated with dental visits. As patients step through the doors, they are greeted by a professional team that guides them seamlessly from consultation to treatment. The clinic's dedication to maintaining a clean and safe space for dental care is apparent, fostering an atmosphere where patient well-being is the top priority. While recent feedback indicates some patients' experiences have not met expectations, the clinic continuously strives to enhance its service quality and patient satisfaction.

Conveniently situated in the heart of Penang, Dental Clinic Dr. Rohani Hj. Sher Jung is easily accessible to locals and visitors alike, making it an integral part of the community's healthcare landscape. The clinic's operating hours accommodate busy schedules, ensuring that patients can receive care without disrupting their daily routines. As an indispensable healthcare resource in Sungai Gelugor, the clinic remains committed to upholding the highest standards of dental practice and contributing positively to the community's oral health.
